comments.body: Euca2ools do not attempt to be compatible with aws-cli.

*Euca2ools Version*

{{3.3.1-0.1839.51.20161208gita195aac.el7}}

*Steps*

# Installed euca2ools from nightly repo:
{code}
[root@d-14 ~]# yum install http://downloads.eucalyptus.com/software/euca2ools/nightly/devel/rhel/7/x86_64/euca2ools-release-nightly-0-1.el7.noarch.rpm -y
[root@d-14 ~]# yum install euca2ools -y
{code}
# Tested linked {{cfn-elb-cloudwatch-vpc-noaz-template.json}} cloudformation template:
{code}
[root@d-14 ~]# euform-get-template-summary --template-file cfn-elb-cloudwatch-vpc-noaz-template.json --region qa-admin@drake
DESCRIPTION	CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack in Eucalyptus VPC
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::VPC
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::Subnet
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::InternetGateway
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::VPCGatewayAttachment
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::RouteTable
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::Route
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::SubnetRouteTableAssociation
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::NetworkAcl
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::NetworkAclEntry
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::SubnetNetworkAclAssociation
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::ElasticLoadBalancing::LoadBalancer
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::AutoScaling::LaunchConfiguration
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::AutoScaling::AutoScalingGroup
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::AutoScaling::ScalingPolicy
RESOURCETYPES	AWS::CloudWatch::Alarm
PARAMETER	ImageId	false		Ubuntu Image id
PARAMETER	KeyName	false		Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instances
PARAMETER	InstanceType	false	m1.xlarge	Type of EC2 instance to launch.
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	m1.small
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	t1.micro
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	m3.medium
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	c1.medium
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	m1.large
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	m1.xlarge
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	c1.xlarge
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	m2.xlarge
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	m3.xlarge
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	m2.2xlarge
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	m3.2xlarge
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	cc1.4xlarge
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	m2.4xlarge
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	hi1.4xlarge
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	cc2.8xlarge
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	cg1.4xlarge
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	cr1.8xlarge
ALLOWED-VALUE	InstanceType	hs1.8xlarge
PARAMETER	MinSize	false	2	Minimum number of EC2 instances.
PARAMETER	MaxSize	false	4	Maximum number of EC2 instances.
{code}
